Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani was thrown out trying to score from second on Teoscar Hern√°ndez's single in the fourth.
Will Smith and Gavin Lux each hit a two-run homer for the Dodgers.
Jackson Merrill robbed Max Muncy in the 5th inning with the Dodgers up 5-0.
Pre-Game Insights: Manny Machado said, 'It's win or go home, so go out there and leave it on the field.'
The Padres are expected to send Yu Darvish to the mound in Game 5.
Post-Match Reflections: The Padres' gamble to start Dylan Cease on short rest backfired.
Manny Machado expressed confidence in Yu Darvish saying, 'We got the right guy on the mound and we definitely have all the confidence in the world in him.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Petco Park-record crowd of 47,773 had hoped to see the Friars again eliminate the hated Dodgers in the NLDS.
Freddie Freeman was sidelined by a right ankle sprain.
Others: The Dodgers snapped a two-game losing streak with the 8-0 win.
The winner will have home-field advantage in the National League Championship Series against the New York Mets.
